subject: Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Duke University is expected to announce Monday that it will reinstate its men's lacrosse program next season, more than two months after the season was canceled in the wake of a woman's accusation that she was raped at a team party.
snippet: Duke University is expected to announce Monday that it will reinstate its men's lacrosse program next season, more than two months after the season was canceled in the wake of a woman's accusation that she was raped at a team party.
